name: swap
description: Server side apps that feel client side.

scripts.build: npm run clean; parcel build cypress/app/parcel.html --no-source-maps --out-dir cypress/app/dist --public-url /dist
scripts.dev: nodemon --ignore cypress/app/dist --ignore cypress/integration -e js,html --exec "npm run app"

author: Shane Thacker <shane@steadymade.com>
